page.title: 06HOMELIFE(CONT) HOUSING
page.content:
NORMALLY THE STOCK IS CONSUMED QUITE RAPIDLY BUT ANY EXCESS IS FROZEN AND KEPT IN CASE OF EMERGENCY. NOT MANY PETS ARE KEPT BUT OF THOSE WHICH ARE DOGS AND CATS ARE FAVOURITE. DOGS,HOWEVER, TEND TO BE BORDER COLLIES AND ARE WORKING DOGS.
{HOUSING THE AREA HAS VARYING TYPES OF HOUSING. THE VILLAGE CONSISTS OF PRE 1920 STONE TERRACED HOUSES,COUNCIL HOUSING BUILT IN THE 1950'S AND PRIVATE BUNGALOWS ON THE SEA FRONT BUILT BETWEEN 1940 AND 1984. THE FARMHOUSES ARE ALL EARLY 1900'S WITH MODERNISED FARMWORKERS COTTAGES CLOSE TO THE MAIN HOUSE.
